body.name: COSTWAY 8-in-1 Air Fryer Oven, Multifunctional Programmable 19QT Cooking Oven with 10 Accessories, Rotisserie, 8 Pre-set Recipe, LED Digital Touchscreen, Viewing Window, 1800W (Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 57 mins.
features: 【🍢 8-in-1 Versatile Air Fryer Oven】------This electric air fryer oven features 8 preset cooking options for easy kitchen tasks. Our electric air fryer oven can be used not only as an air oven, but also as an air fryer, dehydrator, rotisserie, pizza grill, etc. The versatile oven will satisfy your diverse cooking needs through creating a variety of cuisines.

【🍖 Oil-free & Healthy Cooking Mode】------Compare to the traditional way of cooking by using hot oil, the air fryer oven uses 360° hot air circulation to cook food which reduces the fat up to 85%.Our versatile air fryer oven will deliver on the promise of providing healthy food as well as tasty taste for you.

【🌭 Large Capacity & Safety Guarantee】------19 quart cooking space allows you to prepare ample gourmet food for your family members. To avoid plastic odors, the inside of this unit is made of galvanized steel. And non-slip feet, heat-resistant housing, automatic shut off function and overheating protection can further ensure safety. With FDA and ETL certification, you can use our electric air fryer oven with confidence.

【🍗 Easy-to-operate & Convenient Design】------Intelligent digital screens give your great aid to the easy control of time and temperature. You can set the temperature from 90°F to 400°F and set the time from 1 to 60 minutes, the operating time of dehydrating is from 1 to 24 hours. Transparent window and interior lighting allow you to monitor food easily while cooking.

【🍖 Complete Cooking Accessories】------Our electric air fryer oven comes with 10 useful cooking accessories which including rotisserie shaft, 2 rotisserie forks, skewers rack, rotating mesh basket, 3 air flow racks, drip tray, rotisserie fetch tool. All accessories are removable for easy cleaning and the chicken fork is dishwasher safe.

productInformation.value: #82,692 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining) #270 in Air Fryers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I mainly bought this for the color
reviews.reviewText: I wanted this one for the color to match my kitchen. I must say i am pleasantly surprised. This is an upgrade from my last air fryer. It is bigger has some extra features and a basket as well as 2 trays. Cooks food great so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works beautifully. Plenty of room. Good price.
reviews.reviewText: I was a big fan of the NuWave but I could not manage the top any more. NuWave makes a similar air fryer but I decided to try the Costway because if the price. I’m very pleased with the look and ease of use. I like not having to use the full sized oven for simple meals. The shelves allow cooking multiple things at once. Every thing is crispy, hit and fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have!
reviews.reviewText: I love my new air fryer. There's so much room in it. Still have a lot of stuff I want to cook in it. I highly recommend this one. I use my almost every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Arrived broken, but purchased from Walmart
reviews.reviewText: This item arrived with a broken handle, but seller refunded and I purchased from Walmart and added the extended warranty for 3 year coverage. Amazon seller would not let me add after purchase and before delivery. Review are mixed so I added the warranty. So far “2 weeks” it’s working great and is easy for the kids with touchscreen pictures. Rotisserie basket for fries is a new one for me. Very cool

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Christmas gift!
reviews.reviewText: Gave to daughter for ChristmasMy 17 yr old grandson loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It stopped working…
reviews.reviewText: Okay, so I really loved this thing. I ordered it back in July, and have had no complaints… it’s easy to use, worked great, it’s super cute… I actually really enjoyed using it. Then one day it stopped working. No reason, no warning… it’s just dead. I used it 2-3 times per week, so it wasn’t excessively used or abused in any way. It’s easily one of my favorite kitchen gadgets, so it’s really a shame that it quit working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Perfect color to match my kitchen appliances cooks well and has a rotisserie

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love it !
reviews.reviewText: Would buy again. We use it several times a day.

I was very skeptical about air fryers over all. Did lots of research and choose this unit. Hesitated between white or green but totally happy with product. Big frit lover here and total positive difference with regular convection oven I have. Truly crispy as wanted. Since then, I tried many other items and all much better then I had hoped. I’m now a believer in air fryers.
